daily_activities: Morning: Hiking at Mount Batur to watch the sunrise
Afternoon: Visit the Bali Museum in Denpasar to learn about the island's history and culture
Evening: Enjoy the nightlife at Kuta Beach, with its many bars and clubs
Morning: Adventure sports - surfing or paddleboarding at Nusa Dua Beach
Afternoon: Shopping at the Ubud Art Market for local handicrafts and souvenirs
Evening: Dining at a traditional Balinese restaurant in Ubud, with a focus on local cuisine
Morning: Sightseeing at the Tirta Empul Temple, a sacred water temple
Afternoon: Hiking at the Campuhan Ridge Walk, with its stunning views of the surrounding landscape
Evening: Enjoy the nightlife at Seminyak, with its upscale bars and restaurants
Morning: Visit the Agung Rai Museum of Art (ARMA) in Ubud, with its collection of Balinese and Indonesian art
Afternoon: Adventure sports - white-water rafting or kayaking on the Ayung River
Evening: Dining at a beachfront restaurant in Jimbaran, with its focus on seafood
Morning: Sightseeing at the Uluwatu Temple, with its stunning cliffside location and views of the Indian Ocean
Afternoon: Shopping at the Galeria Mall in Kuta, with its range of international and local brands
Evening: Enjoy the nightlife at Legian, with its many bars and clubs

travel_instructions.estimated_travel_time: Approximately 8 hours and 30 minutes to 10 hours, depending on the route and layovers
travel_instructions.route_details: From Ahmedabad, take a flight to Ngurah Rai International Airport (DPS) in Bali, possibly with layovers in cities like Mumbai, Delhi, or Singapore, depending on the airline and route.
